website_summaries.verdict: An intermediate skate that is comfortable and a decent quality for someone who wants to start speed skating.
pros: Comfortable for people with high arches
A good harness for derby beginners
Good material and stitching on the skate
cons: These skates have a man-made upper, and won't have the longevity or comfort of a leather skate

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough for derby
customer_reviews.text: In general, I like these skates. They arrived on time, fit comfortably, and they were a good skate to go through fresh meat training. However, after 4.5 months, the vinyl plate is already detaching from the rest of the skate, and that's really disappointing. I should have spent the extra money on a better brand. By all means, purchase these if you just have a light skating hobby. Don't buy these if you're serious about jamming and blocking.
customer_reviews.author: Septimus Severian

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great skate for Beginner/Intermediate skaters. Bought them for my son after he showed some interest. I would compare them to the Carerra that was out in the mid and early 2000’s. Very comfortable, wheels are actually decent for what your paying. Only thing you may wanna consider down the road after some time in them are the bearings. Other than that great skates
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Narrow at the toe
customer_reviews.text: Toe s ..... this boot is super narrow at the toe . In all the reviews no one mentioned this . I should have bought a size larger . They DO NOT run true to size . Adjust your trucks before you skate. Nealry every nut was loose. Tighten adjust . Very sloppy skate. Break these in slow take your time . I will spend more for an better product . The packaging the actual skate box look like it came out of the trash .
customer_reviews.author: Adam I Berman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rink skates
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Medium 9.5 US size in shoes/sneakers, the size 9 was too small near the toes and had to return for a size 10 which fit a little snug just before the toes, but I'm happy after breaking it in after a few days of use. These ride super smooth on the rink and fast. They are effortless to ride on, not as fast as the other skates folks own, but much faster and smoother than any rental skates you ever wore.
customer_reviews.author: NDP

customer_reviews.title: Says r3s but they are darts.
customer_reviews.text: Super stoked to get these. They were advertised as r3s. But they are actually Darts. Not overly mad. They'll both work the same for me but someone who is specifically looking for r3s might be mad
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Slove

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic skates, Comfortable and smooth.
customer_reviews.text: I use these skates every few weeks at the local skating ring and have enjoyed them very much. I bought them because of their low price, high quality and did not want to rent the old broken skates the skating ring offers. These are very comfortable and smooth. I would recommend adjusting the break and putting a little thread lock on the threads before final tightening. I am a beginner and am just starting to learn about skating. After more than 20 hours of skating they still look new and none of the components have broken or bent. I would recommend these skates.
customer_reviews.author: mrsdwb

customer_reviews.title: they have lasted me for most of Fresh meat practice ...
customer_reviews.text: they have lasted me for most of Fresh meat practice. They are ok beginner skates. I ordered a men's size 8. which is women's size 9, and i wear and 81/2-9 shoe size(depending on shoe) in women's. and they are kind of large. However, they stretch in width. if you order the same size you will have a bit of toe room at the top.
customer_reviews.author: keniatta

customer_reviews.title: Best brand!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my sons second pair of these skates, not to lack of quality, but for the quality and durability! Needed a new pair because of foot growth. He plays roller derby and these are the best out there!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Saleem

customer_reviews.title: Spot on for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter once known for about five years as the areas limbo skating champion LOVES them. THOUGH I bought WAY better bearings for them. We also put led lights on them. THESE DO NOT HAVE THE ANKLE SUPPORT beginners SHOULD have. I would say these are good skate for the intermediate and expert IF you buy better bearings. I would say a 4 1/4- 4 1/2 Star skate. Gave 5 as no 4.5 rating option.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very good skates its hard to find size 14. You have to get a size larger than your shoe size unless you have narrow feet you may be ok. A little more money than i wanted to pay for skates. My wife with small feet can get skates for half the money
customer_reviews.author: Rochester Jantz

customer_reviews.title: Great for moderate/advanced skaters!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a birthday gift for my girlfriends younger daughter. She's 12 and wears a womens size 8 (ordered size 9 skates). They are a little big on her, but that gives her room to grow. They are really high quality and are very well padded. She's a moderate/advanced skater and just loves them. The strap being tight seems to be important for stability and it does take some strength to tighten it up. I'm sure once they break in it will be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Niko Shiner

customer_reviews.title: Good skates worth paying for.
customer_reviews.text: 8 year old Son loves them. Uses both indoor and out. The wheels and bearings are holding up great unlike the cheap first pair of skates I got him. He likes them so much he sleeps with them under his bed. I attached pictures of the cheap skates he used 3 times and wore our and these he has used over 20 times.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: They’re great, but they take a lot of work to get ready for use. The wheels were way too tight, and the trucks were way too loose. Also if you’re skating on a regular indoor skating floor, the wheels will slip on you when you try to do a crossover. I can’t tell you how many times I nearly fell trying to tweak the balance on them. The stops also twist and unscrew while you slow down about half the time. They are great though, and if you’re willing to work on them a bit while practicing, I’d say they’re worth it!
customer_reviews.author: griffin Valentine

customer_reviews.title: fell apart in first use
customer_reviews.text: I would like a replacement I'm not happy and don't want this to happen to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable. They come a little tight in regards to turning but some YouTube videos on how to adjust properly solve that. They are really cute and easy to wipe off dirt. I changed the wheels to multi color outdoor wheels and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: core

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates very poorly packaged!
customer_reviews.text: These skates arrived in a regular box that you would get at the store. No carton for protection. UPS left it on a snowy step which memoir was a mess! Great looking Christmas present in a destroyed box! Try protecting your customers purchases disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Kathe B

customer_reviews.title: They only has a two colors left in my size so I guess I'll have to learn to love the blue
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on Saturday, they fit perfectly. They only has a two colors left in my size so I guess I'll have to learn to love the blue. They are sturdy and comfortable. I bought these to skate the paved path by me so I bought outdoor wheels whack were daily easy to change out. Spent about an hour skating on them Sunday, no blisters or weird places rubbing my feet. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: EmilyB.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome skate.....awesome fit!
customer_reviews.text: These skates were great! They fit perfectly! I wear a woman's 6 and I ordered a 5! I have had to work on adjusting the wheels and trucks while I'm at the rink....just bring that tool with you and you're good to go!! I've had so much fun!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Size not as big as you think.
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 6 to 6.5 in womens and I have a slim foot, and based on the their recommendations, I bought a size down, size 5. It was too small and will be returning and ordering a size 6. As for the skate itself, Riedell never disappoint in quality and comfort. I usually wear Riedell Carrera, which seem to longer exist. But they last forever and stay in good shape with indoor/outdoor use. I recommend outdoor wheels for a smoother ride.
customer_reviews.author: CherryCakez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I've been visiting the local rink with my two daughters lately and decided it was a good time to purchase my own skates and stop using the rentals. I am a women's size 10 shoe or 10.5 in sandals, and the size 9 fit perfectly (it's all men's sizing). The skates seem to roll just as freely as the rentals, and they are very comfortable. I didn't have any blisters after 2 hours of skating in them! I purchased the aqua color which is cute, but I wish I had chosen a girly pink or purple.
customer_reviews.author: coradj76

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these because I needed something that fit better for derby
customer_reviews.text: This skates fit my feet very well. I have very narrow feet and couldn't get my other pair tight enough. I ordered these because I needed something that fit better for derby. The wheels that come on these are a great started wheel, for me at least.
customer_reviews.author: KaylaRieR

customer_reviews.title: Memories
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these when I was growing up. Now that I'm trying to teach my son how to skate I ordered me a new pair. Fit as expected and brought back a lot of memories
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice skates I feel like a teenager again I wear a size 11 men’s and ordered that size they fit perfectly. These are really well made I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive skates
customer_reviews.text: Been out of the skate scene for a while and decided I wanted back in. Got these as a nice inexpensive hobby pair and couldn't be happier. Riedell will always be my first choice when it comes to skates. Absolutely love them, as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ari D.

customer_reviews.title: Good skate
customer_reviews.text: A decent beginner speed skate. You get your money’s worth with Reidell. Decent price especially with the free prime shipping. True to fit size. (Men’s)
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: hurt the top and side of my right foot.
customer_reviews.text: The skates are a very nice loook. But the skate on my right foot feels like something is in it and it hurts the top of my foot after a few mins of skating and then u think the feeling would go away after a while but what it's really doing is making your feet sore and very NOM and that's not a great feeling once you take your skate off your foot be hurting so bad.
customer_reviews.author: lesliewillis

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: These run small. I wear a 10, bought a 10 and they were really tight. They felt better after a few nights of skating.
customer_reviews.author: ClintonP

customer_reviews.title: Love them :)
customer_reviews.text: The fit was so cozy and snug. I do suggest getting the protection for the front so you don’t mess em up. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners just starting out. Invest in a better skate if going farther in roller derby but works great as a backup it outdoor skate if you decide to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: May want to go a size higher
customer_reviews.text: The size 13 I purchased was really tight around my feet. Maybe it's a rule of thumb I didn't know about when purchasing skates, but for the flat feet men and women who wears a size 13 shoe, you may want to go a 1/2 size or full size higher with these skates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the money. They will need some adjustments, but perfect for rink skating. I love the funky blue color. Easy to update with new wheels and bearings if you don’t like the way they skate.
customer_reviews.author: Alymom

customer_reviews.title: These are great starter derby skates
customer_reviews.text: These are great starter derby skates. Love them so much. It's been over a year and they are still going strong. You can always put in your own inserts etc. Overall, great skates for price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: We've had these over a year my only problem is one of the skates wouldn't tighten at the stopper so now we have one with no stopper or washer and can't find a replacement that matches the one on the other skate.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Payne

customer_reviews.title: but I believe they will be fine after a break in period
customer_reviews.text: I could have gone up a size, but I believe they will be fine after a break in period. The Skates look exactly like the Photo. Very Good quality. I would recommend these. Two Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Wrong boot. Wrong wheels. They sent a high ...
customer_reviews.text: Wrong boot. Wrong wheels. They sent a high cuff artistic skate with small 57mm wheels. Not the speed/derby skate with 62mm wheels which was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Garner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the skates themselves, but the wheels and toe stops that come on them are garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Lynk

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: I had not been on skates for years, and I was a little wobbly at first but like riding a bike you never forget how to do it. These skates are VERY fast. It took me a little time to get used to them but I love them. The wheels are a little wider than what I was used to and the stoppers are a little small but they can be easily replaced. These skates were a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ohio

customer_reviews.title: Great derby skates
customer_reviews.text: Great derby skates. The wheels are 92a and the perfect hardness for beginner derby. The Toe stops are really small, so I would replace them once you start doing toe work.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Ashline

customer_reviews.title: Skate happy!!
customer_reviews.text: 16 year granddaughter picked them out. I was concerned about size but the recommendations made from the site were very good and the fit great. The color was vibrant and she loved them. Fortunately her home has hard wood and tile floor so she was able to skate around in the house and they left no marks. We have talked of getting the street type wheels so she can go outside but for now she is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Beginner Skate, Recommend upgrade wheels and berrings later.
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson is now a great skater and CRU S8 Expert. These skates are well made and good Riedell Quality. After time we changed for better wheels and Berrings.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Denis

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. Teen son thought they were great. He said the wheels were a little slippery at the rink and I thought the bearing were a little stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable skates. The wheels are not very soft
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable skates. The wheels are not very soft, and so are suited for streets or sidewalks. But they do fine in a rink,
customer_reviews.author: FamilyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a different set of wheels for outdoors. My previous (worn-out), Ridels were indestructible leather indoor/outdoor. So my “good deal” didn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Meleski

customer_reviews.title: I love my new skates a lot
customer_reviews.text: I love my new skates a lot! Fit exactly how the sizing chart said they would. If you plan on using them for roller derby, you will need to get different toe stops and possibly wheels, but the skates themselves are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Osterberg

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of skates
customer_reviews.text: These skates fit perfectly and look great! I wore them to a roller skating rink party and skated for 3 hours without a problem. I got a ton of compliments. I love these skates! Hopefully, they will hold up. If not, I will update my review, but so far so good and this is a really good skate company.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fits big.
customer_reviews.text: Fit way too big. Aside from fit this is a great basic quad skate for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: Riedell are definitely top of the line skates. Bought as a birthday present and they arrived in 2 days just as they said. I searched a number of sites for these skates in this color. This was the best price of any.
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Derby boot camp starts Next Saturday. Can't wait to see my girl out there.
customer_reviews.author: Conchita Tolles

customer_reviews.title: but I loved this one because it was so easy for me ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm beginner I tried another skates, but I loved this one because it was so easy for me to skate on this one. I think this is the best skates for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Bina

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, reasonable price, nice skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for teenage son who just started into skating. Price was reasonable and one of only few ones I could find in his size 14. He has worn them 3 times since they arrived and he loves them so far for his level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: My first-ever pair of roller-skates. Love them. Smooth ride. Effective stoppers.
customer_reviews.author: KumboochaT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son is still wearing these 3 yrs later. He’s a jam skater and can go for hours. They have held up without any wear & tears! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Frank

customer_reviews.title: The toe stops aren't very good and kept falling out
customer_reviews.text: The toe stops aren't very good and kept falling out. I replaced them within a week of use. For beginners, the skates are great but I'll be upgrading the wheels soon. I ordered two sizes down and they fit great
customer_reviews.author: Hiram watson

customer_reviews.title: My son is a skating rink guard and he uses ...
customer_reviews.text: My son is a skating rink guard and he uses these for 10 - 12 hours a day. He really loves them.
customer_reviews.author: M.J. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t skated in 40 something years. These were very comfortable. No problem getting back into it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This the skate for you!
customer_reviews.text: Riedell is the top brand for your dollar. Well made and very durable. The thing I can say is they are very slippery after first. But once broke in to your liking this is a awesome skate.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Thurman

customer_reviews.title: VIGOR RATING
customer_reviews.text: Skates were so Comforting , they seemed to become,” not just footwear“ But apart of my body structure on wheels!
customer_reviews.author: GreenGrassGrowsllc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great skates! They fit really well (I’m a women’s 8 and I ordered a men’s 7) and are a lot easier to use than I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: You buy this
customer_reviews.text: It's so lit👌😂 I use the skates in my free time
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Other than that good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Toe stops are too short and small for my liking so ordered new larger and longer ones. Other than that good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super value and quality in a cool looking skate.
customer_reviews.text: Great Rink skate, Made with quality materials. Wheels and bearings are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great starters. But you will need to buy better cushions as these do not flex and better toe stops.
customer_reviews.author: Lee's Legacy

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Had to have someone tighten adjust the wheels because they didn't want to turn properly but all in all I love them and I love the color ! I got the teal/turquoise
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Making memories!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Easier to use indoors, yet traveling from inside wood floors to exterior concrete is smooth. Great fit too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and great skate. The wheels roll smoothly and the fit is right on!
customer_reviews.author: klee

customer_reviews.title: 😁
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to go skating in the rank next time.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Skates
customer_reviews.text: Only dislike is it comes with indoor wheels so you’ll have to buy outdoor ones if that’s what your buying them for.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Van alstine

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my granddaughters birthday. They are so well made and my granddaughter loves them. The colors are so beautiful and they roll like top quality skates.
customer_reviews.author: CRISCOKID

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful roller skates!
customer_reviews.text: These are a beautiful skates of great quality and excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Laydelis Leon-Cobo

customer_reviews.title: Great skates great price
customer_reviews.text: These skates are great and for an awesome price! They ate exactly what I expected and came in a timely manner☺
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice skates
customer_reviews.text: Nice skates for the money, wheels are terrible. But glad I bought them. Way better then rental skates.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: These have been been a really nice upgrade. Good choice for beginner derby!
customer_reviews.author: Maia

customer_reviews.text: Great skates! Love the color option! Great traction for speed! Will be telling others about these skates for their kids.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Lots of padding!
customer_reviews.text: Love these skates! Lots of padding, feel great while your skating!
customer_reviews.author: Billi R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t fit and the wheels were messed up . I couldn’t go straight
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these skates and she says they are comfortable to wear. Quality also seems great.
customer_reviews.author: 12Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my daughter; she loves them. Sizing could be simplified, but we ordered a size 6 which fit her well.
customer_reviews.author: Anelga

customer_reviews.title: 3 happy children on Christmas morning when these skates were opened
customer_reviews.text: 3 happy children on Christmas morning when these skates were opened. Thanks to the company who worked with me on sizes.
customer_reviews.author: jules-1299

customer_reviews.title: Well-built, first rink skates for beginners and experienced, casual skaters
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 12-year-old granddaughter who is an experienced, casual skater. They fit well, are comfortable, and appear to be well-built and sturdy for first rink skates. While our granddaughter is not hard on them, these skates look like they would take a lot of abuse without showing it. -- VERY SATISFIED!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Airstreamer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: daughter loves these and skates weekly- said trucks need adjusting
customer_reviews.author: Joe A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything I could have expected....... will definitely upgrade, when I need new skstes
customer_reviews.author: Herb-Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Skates
customer_reviews.text: great skate at a good price. Seller was fast and easy to work with,
customer_reviews.author: magicurt

customer_reviews.title: Great skates but brake fell out with in two hours of using.
customer_reviews.text: Wore my skates for a total of two hours and my one brake is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: Fyi all sizes are stated as men's size (even the ones not clearly men sz/women sz). I was concerned when I ordered the "6" when the "mens 6/women's 7" was showing unavailable. But..They are exactly what we needed ( ladies 7) She loves them, says they are very comfortable, and I'd just ecstatic. These were her Valentine's Day gift from me ( mom). I'm glad she gets this great exercise ( she's 16) and wants to duo this rather than get into trouble somewhere..so I'm all about supporting this activity for my daughter-thanks forfor the great price & fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice skates! My daughter shat herself when she got these for her birthday!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Look nice. Fit well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in time. Look nice. Fit well. So far have been working well for a month or so. Let’s see how things pan out.
customer_reviews.author: Sheikh Ajaz Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son says they fit like tennis shoes. They are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: This is our 4th pair of darts for the kids. Great starter skates and a responsible price
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: They're great! I got them as my first ever pair ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one size below my shoe size. They're great! I got them as my first ever pair of skates for roller derby and they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Pszonak

customer_reviews.title: I made the adjustments and it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: My boot was all loose and the frame was crooked, nothing was assembled properly ,but in all after some tlc and having knowledge of skates ,I made the adjustments and it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered them for myself but they were too big so I gave them to my mom. They are a little loose on her (she wears a women's 8 1/2) these are an 8 in men's. We go to the rink once a week for 3 hours and my mom who is 63yrs old... Skates the entire time. They are so cushiony on the inside. I bought the riedell r3's and they aren't as cushiony as these and they were a little more expensive. Anyway these were a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: ... in a week earlier then planned and they are perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: They came in a week earlier then planned and they are perfect!!! I've tried a few rollers and for the price this is an amazing product! Can't wait for my first practice tonight! #freshmeat
customer_reviews.author: clara houde-brunette

customer_reviews.title: Fit great. Only problem was when arrived all nuts and ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Fit great. Only problem was when arrived all nuts and bolts where very loose.
customer_reviews.author: Jami

customer_reviews.title: Order 2 sizes bigger than your normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.text: Order 2 sizes bigger than your normal shoe size. My daughter wears 5's so I ordered 6's and they're too small
customer_reviews.author: craig mcalexander

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner derby skates
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my foray into roller derby. I only had two problems: The toe stops are horrible and the wheels were too hard for my taste. I purchased short-stem Gumball toe stops and Atom Juke wheels and man, what a difference. All in all, though, these are great skates for figuring out if you're in it for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son was super excited to find skates he could wear
customer_reviews.text: My son was super excited to find skates he could wear. He loves them. Only thing he will change will be the toe stopper but That is just a color thing for him though. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Turrisi

customer_reviews.title: great quality , fast delivery!!
customer_reviews.text: Just tried them out and all I can say is " Outstanding"! Great quality will definitely buy from this shop again, my reccomendation is rendered!
customer_reviews.author: ChasetheFace

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these skates, and they have had ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these skates, and they have had so much use. I think I may have a future roller derby girl on my hands!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Hire

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love the skates! I'm using them for outdoor use, after you buy outdoor wheels they're great! Good quality!

customer_reviews.title: Love them. I'm 7 girl size
customer_reviews.text: Love them.I'm 7 girl size,got a 5.they feel ok but it would feel better in a 6.

product_meta.title: Riedell Skates - Dart - Quad Roller Speed Skates
feature_bullets: HIGH-QUALITY ULTRA DURABLE ROLLER SKATES - These quad roller skates are man-made using a vinyl material that creates a breathable, yet durable skate boot.
EASY TO LACE & COMFORTABLE FIT - These adjustable roller skates have an easy lace system and a Velcro cinch strap that makes adjusting the skates simple.

SMOOTHEST RIDE POSSIBLE - These high quality skates feature ABEC-5 ball bearings designed to roll exceptionally smooth. These skates' polished, chromed steel ball bearings minimize friction to give you the best ride.

DESIGNED WITH SAFETY IN MIND - These traditional roller shoes are designed with safety in mind. The boot has a low, yet snug fit around the ankle and the Velcro cinch strap helps secure the foot in the boot while skating.
VERSATILE WHEELS TO FIT ANY USE - The quad derby skates also have tough 62mm, 93A hardness polyurethane wheels that are designed to provide extra grip.
